verbs.description: diagnosticate (third-person singular simple present diagnosticates, present participle diagnosticating, simple past and past participle diagnosticated)

entries.meaning: (archaic, transitive) To make a diagnosis of; to recognise (a disease or similar) by its symptoms.
examples: Paracyesis and interstitial or cornuate fetation are purposely omitted, as such accidents can scarcely be diagnosticated  […]
